short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to take short breaks for mindfulness practice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the fast-paced digital world, it's more important than ever to take a step back and breathe. The "Mindfulness Break Reminder" is here to help you do just that. This Chrome extension encourages users to take short, mindful breaks at regular intervals, promoting mental wellbeing and enhancing productivity.

Features
Customizable Reminder Intervals
Set your preferred time intervals for the mindfulness reminders, tailoring the extension to fit seamlessly into your workflow.

Inspiring Messages
Receive encouraging and calming messages that nudge you to pause, reflect, and breathe, helping to reduce stress and foster a serene work environment.

Simple and Elegant Design
Enjoy a clean and minimalist design that is easy on the eyes, encouraging a calm and focused mind.

Easy to Use
With an intuitive interface, setting up and using the extension is a breeze, making it easy to incorporate mindfulness into your daily routine.

Benefits
Enhanced Focus
Regular breaks can rejuvenate the mind, helping you maintain high levels of focus throughout the day.

Reduced Stress
By encouraging regular mindfulness practices, the extension aids in reducing stress and promoting mental wellbeing.

Improved Productivity
Taking short breaks can actually improve productivity by preventing burnout and maintaining a fresh perspective.

Usage
Installation
Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store, and it will be added to your browser, ready to assist you in fostering mindfulness.

Configuration
Set your preferred reminder intervals in the popup window, easily accessible from the Chrome toolbar.

Feedback and Support
We are open to feedback and constantly working to improve your experience. For any queries or suggestions, feel free to reach out to our support team.
